title: Brazil
creator_credit: Embassy International Pictures, Terry Gilliam, Tom Stoppard, Charles McKeown, Norman Garwood, Patrick Cassavetti, Arnon Milchan and James Acheson
headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1985
brief_description: Low-level bureaucrat Sam Lowry escapes the monotony of his day-to-day life through a recurring daydream of himself as a virtuous hero saving a beautiful damsel. Investigating a case that led to the wrongful arrest and eventual death of an innocent man instead of wanted terrorist Harry Tuttle, he meets the woman from his daydream, and in trying to help her gets caught in a web of mistaken identities, mindless bureaucracy and lies.
